name: Castle
description: Build and protect castles simultaneously in this original and addictive game!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP and later Processor: Single 2 GHz or Dual 1.6 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 70 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: XP and later Processor: Single 3 GHz or Dual 2.2 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 70 MB available space
